message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $145. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $100 is too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $122?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I can meet you at $115, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
